item.title: tikzcd snippets for VS Code
item.description: For writing LaTeX documents, I use VS Code together with the latex-workshop extension. One thing I particularly like about VS Code is its built-in support for snippets and how easy it is to implement your own. As there aren’t any extensions in the marketplace providing snippets for commutative diagrams, I implemented some using tikz-cd on my own: Demonstration This is what using the snippets looks like: Result: I cycle through the preselected X, Y, S, T by pressing tab, which makes it very convenient to change the objects’ names appearing in the diagram.
